name: P36_10s
prompt: suburban home backyard with patio and lawn, viewed from an elevated position under the roofline, looking out over the yard at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. An unfamiliar child. An unknown child wanders into the backyard looking around curiously. Static elevated viewpoint, wide field of view covering patio and lawn area, wide-angle with slight edge softening, Clear high-quality footage with sharp details. Real-time speed, natural fluid human motion at 1x playback rate.
negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, artifacts, glitches, distorted, unrealistic motion, multiple camera angles, jump cuts, visible camera, security camera device, doorbell camera, camera lens visible, camera equipment, camera housing, surveillance camera in frame, camera mount, camera on wall, camera on ceiling, camera rig, recording device in shot, gopro, webcam, CCTV camera visible, Ring doorbell visible, Nest camera visible, slow motion, time lapse, fast forward, sped up, slowed down
